actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish National Historic Trails as a new category of trails within the National Trails System, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the National Trails System Act to establish national historic trails as a new category of trails within the National Trails System. Sets criteria for the designation of trails as National Historic Trails. Directs the Secretary of the Interior to encourage the States to consider establishing historic trails as part of their comprehensive historic preservation plans.

titles.title: A bill to establish National Historic Trails as a new category of trails within the National Trails System, and for other purposes.
